ir.taghizadeh.tehran.activities.lists.comments

Class CommentsAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<CommentsListViewHolder>
      • ir.taghizadeh.tehran.activities.lists.comments.CommentsAdapter

  • public class CommentsAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<CommentsListViewHolder>

    CommentsAdapter

    This class is a simple Adapter that passes injected Glide to its viewHolder to load images. No item click listener is implemented. Note: setHasStableIds() true and override getItemId() with position to make sure that your recyclerView does its best performance.
    Since:
    2019-01-06
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ali Taghizadeh Gevari
